Key Match Events: Royce Lewis snapped an 0-for-22 slump with a two-run double in the seventh inning
Willi Castro snapped an 0-for-16 skid with the game-tying single in the fourth inning
Brooks Lee broke out of his 0-for-19 funk with a two-run double in the fourth inning
Matt Wallner homered in the first inning
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Rocco Baldelli announced that Byron Buxton will return to the Twins' roster for Friday's series opener against the Reds
Carlos Correa is also expected to return soon
Post-Match Reflections: Royce Lewis expressed excitement about the team's momentum and the return of Buxton and Correa
Manager Rocco Baldelli noted that the return of Buxton and Correa gives the team hope and will be huge for their lineup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins remained three games ahead of the Tigers for the final AL Wild Card spot
The Twins held the tiebreaker between the teams
Time is ticking with only 16 games to go in the season
Others: Griffin Jax pitched in front of his family for the first time this season
Zebby Matthews was pulled in the fourth inning and the Twins turned to a flurry of five relievers to close the game out
